name: Fruit N Veg
description:
Fruit N Veg

Stab all the roasted vegetables to score points! 
Avoid the fruit though, they really want to be eaten.

This game was made during a 4 hour twitch stream, celebrating the one year anniversary of my channel:  https://www.twitch.tv/jackmake...

Viewers were asked to pitch us words to help form the game. The words were bundled into a list and selected at random.
We followed this format: Do (verb) to (noun) using (noun).
The resulting sentence was: Destroy roasted vegetables using chopsticks.
4 hours later we had a game.

It's free to download and play. Enjoy!
